title: Need help with mouse
body: My mouse in the middle of games does not function correctly  and cuts off anyone know a fix it's not a problem with the mouse as it's brand new and the one before had the same issue only when playing lol does it occur

replies.body:
When that happens, do you still see the League hand cursor or does it switch to the normal Windows cursor? If it turns into the Windows cursor, it's likely some kind of overlay from Discord or something taking control of the screen, which you can fix by turning off Discord.

If it's still the League cursor and you just can't get anything to work, I'd try a quick config reset to see if your hotkeys are going all wonky for some weird reason.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
ty i think that solved the issue much appreciated
